pacmanprogram
Class ShortestDistanceFinder

java.lang.Object
  pacmanprogram.ShortestDistanceFinder

public class ShortestDistanceFinder
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by ghosts to determine which tile to move into next.

Method Detail

chooseNextTile

public double[] chooseNextTile(double ghostXCoordinate,
                               double ghostYCoordinate,
                               double targetXCoordinate,
                               double targetYCoordinate,
                               double velx,
                               double vely)
This method is used by ghosts that are in scatter or chase mode.

Parameters:
ghostXCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the x direction.
ghostYCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the y direction.
targetXCoordainte - is the position of the target in the x direction.
targetYCoordainte - is the position of the target in the y direction.
velx - is the velocity of the ghost in the x direction.
vely - is the velocity of the ghost in the y direction.
Returns:
The x and y coordinate of the next tile, and the direction that the ghost should move in.

calculateDistance

public double calculateDistance(double tileX,
                                double tileY,
                                double targetX,
                                double targetY)
This method calculates the linear distance between two points.

Parameters:
tileX - position of first point in x direction.
tileY - position of first point in y direction.
targetX - position of second point in x direction.
targetY - position of second point in y direction.
Returns:
Linear distance between two points.

chooseNextRandomTile

public double[] chooseNextRandomTile(double ghostXCoordinate,
                                     double ghostYCoordinate,
                                     double velx,
                                     double vely)
This method is used by ghosts that are in frightened mode.

Parameters:
ghostXCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the x direction.
ghostYCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the y direction.
velx - is the velocity of the ghost in the x direction.
vely - is the velocity of the ghost in the y direction.
Returns:
The x and y coordinate of the next tile, and the direction that the ghost should move in.

landOnTileEdge

public double[] landOnTileEdge(double ghostXCoordinate,
                               double ghostYCoordinate,
                               double xTile,
                               double yTile,
                               double velx,
                               double vely)
This method is used to make sure ghosts land on the edge of a tile when necessary.

Parameters:
ghostXCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the x direction.
ghostYCoordinate - is the position of the ghost in the y direction.
xTile - is the position of the tile in the x direction.
yTile - is the position of the tile in the y direction.
velx - is the velocity of the ghost in the x direction.
vely - is the velocity of the ghost in the y direction.
Returns:
the required x and y velocity to land on the edge of a tile.
